synopsis.text: These OVAs are bonus episodes bundled with the Blu-ray/DVD volumes of the anime “Unbreakable Machine-Doll”. Volume 1 shows the characters arriving at school. Volume 2 focuses on Irori having an accident at the open-air bath. Volume 3 depicts Charl and Frey's encounter in a terrifying bathroom. Volume 4 explores Nadeshiko Akabane's midsummer night's dream. Volume 5 features the main characters alone with two beauties in the infirmary. Finally, Volume 6 brings the pretty girls together amidst swimsuit chaos. Overall, these OVAs provide amusing and lighthearted side stories about the beloved characters from the main anime. Though varying in content and tone, the episodes share an emphasis on comedy, fanservice, and character insight. Fans can enjoy seeing their favorite characters in silly antics and embarrassing situations. These bonus stories promise to compliment and expand on the magical, mechanical world of “Unbreakable Machine-Doll”.
